channel.title: Packets help?
channel.description:
Okay, so i dont know if this would be server sided, or client sided, so if i posted in wrong section, sorry.
The problem is, When im in the slayertower, and use the stairs to go up a floor, it loads, but the screen stays black, and it stays on loading please wait. It wasn't doing this before, so i have no idea. If someone could please help, or tell me why it is staying at loading please wait, and a black screen, that would be great. But, i'm pretty sure, it has to do with the client, sending packets to the server. But not too sure.
Also the source base, is PI. But i have updated it a ton. But since the last update, its doing this at slayer tower now, And i didnt even do anything that has to do with the stairs, at the slayer tower.
